metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42004 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In FasterXML jackson-databind before 2.13.4, resource exhaustion can occur because of a lack of a check in BeanDeserializer._deserializeFromArray to prevent use of deeply nested arrays. An application is vulnerable only with certain customized choices for deserialization.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
